1.0.name: wordpress/nspecific-popular-posts-widget
1.0.description:
One of the best widget plugin for showing Popular Posts in Wordpress.

Easy to install and use.

Many options to select visibity of Posts, like

1. Display Post title
2. Display Post exceprt
3. Display Post date
4. Display Post title
5. Display Post thumbnail
6. Display Post view count etc...

everybody will love it.
